attributes.name: Build Date Range Card
attributes.details:
âœ… Task: Build Date Range Component
Description:
Create a reusable DateRangePicker component that allows users to select a start date and an end date. The component should ensure that:

- The end date cannot be before the start date.
- Both dates are displayed clearly.
- Optionally, a default range (e.g., today to 7 days later) is shown initially.
- Emits a dateRangeChanged event (or equivalent binding) when either date changes.

The component should support:
- Mobile responsiveness
- Accessibility (keyboard navigation, screen reader labels)
- Optional min/max date restrictions
